ygData.subject: Re: Making Plat
ygData.msgSnippet: Sorry, your mistaken. There is a merchant that sells Bat wings. Even after the server resets and no one has longed in, she is waiting there with as many bat
ygData.messageBody:
Sorry, your mistaken. There is a merchant that sells Bat wings. Even after the server resets and no
one has longed in, she is waiting there with as many bat wings as you can afford.

The one I know about is in the mages guild in W. Freeport. I have personally bought backpacks worth
of wings when me AND my group were baking. :)

Omeg Felligan wrote:
>
> From: "Omeg Felligan" <omeg_felligan@...>
>
> Well, not exactly...whenever they patch or server goes down for some reason
> the merchant inventory is reset so all those bat wings get super glued back
> onto rats to make more bats I guess. Well, at anyrate I'm guessing that the
> selling bat wings would work right after a new patch and for a few days
> after that.
>
> Omeg
>
> >This doesn't work much anymore... Bat Wings are purchasable in unlimited
> >amounts in Kithicor and West Freeport (probably other zones as well, Ogguk
> >or Grobb almost ceratinly) for about 14 copper each. People are beginning
> >to
> >know this. :)
